## FigmaLinkObject type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type FigmaLinkObject = {
    url: string;
    metadata: {
        type: 'figmaLink';
        document?: {
            id: string;
            name?: string;
        };
        fileKey: string;
        page?: ({
            id: string;
            name?: string;
        } | null);
        frame?: ({
            id: string;
            name?: string;
        } | null);
    };
};
```
